quiz.text:
As per recent news (Feb 2023), which of the following companies has showcased India’s

1st of its kind Drone with Parachute Integrated System?
options: Eminent Air Private Ltd
Garuda Aerospace
ARCH Drones
Zen Technologies
Adani Defence and Aerospace

quiz.text: ‘Gandhisagar Floating Festival’, touted as Asia’s first floating festival has been held in which of the following places?
options: Aizawl, Manipur
Srinagar, Jammu & Kashmir
Jodhpur, Rajasthan
Mandsaur, Madhya Pradesh
Hyderabad, Telangana

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), which of the following companies has opened the multiplex at Chennai Airport, the first multiplex in the country to be housed within an airport complex?
options: Cinepolis
PVR Cinemas
Cinemax
Carnival Cinemas
Vox Cinemas

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Manuela Roka Botey has been appointed as 1st female PM of which of the following African countries?
options: Cameroon
Guinea-Bissau
Equatorial Guinea
Kenya
Guinea

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), ‘Mero Rukh Mero Santati’ initiative which aims to plant 100 trees

for every new born child born has been launched in which of the following states/UTs?
options: Andhra Pradesh
Telangana
Sikkim
Odisha
West Bengal

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), RailTel Corporation has received a Work Order from the which of the following banks for providing 4G LTE connectivity to 15,000 offsite ATMs across the country?
options: Kotak Mahindra Bank
HDFC Bank
Bank of India
State Bank of India
Canara Bank

quiz.text: Recently in Feb 2023, an MoU has been signed which will enable Primary Agricultural Credit Societies (PACS) to provide services offered by Common Service Centres (CSC). The MoU has been signed by which of the following entities?
options: Ministry of Cooperation
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
NABARD
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text:
As per recent (Feb 2023) news, Australian Trade and Investment Commission (Austrade),

an Australian government agency has signed an MoU with which of the following entities to collaborate on Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) programmes?
options: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
NASSCOM
FICCI
CII

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, Nagaland government has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with which of the following companies for development and area expansion under palm oil cultivation and processing?
options: Patanjali Foods Limited

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), VIHANGAM, a web-based portal that includes a drone and ground

control system has been launched by which of the following entities?

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Electronics and Radar Development Establishment (LRDE) has developed an unfurlable antenna for space radar. LRDE works under which of the following organizations?
options: DRDO
ISRO
BEL
HAL
BDL

quiz.text:
NISAR is a Low Earth Orbit (LEO) observatory being jointly developed by which of the

following space agencies?

A. JAXA                                                               B. ISRO

C. ESA                                                                 D. NASA
options: A and B
A, B and C
B and C
B and D
A, B and D

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Indian Army’s annual firepower demonstration and training exercise _________ has been conducted at the School of Artillery in Deolali, Maharashtra.
options: Exercise Shakti
Exercise Topchi
Exercise Agni
Exercise Kaali
Exercise Veer

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, joint training exercise Trishakti Prahar has been conducted in north Bengal. The exercise involved which of the following forces?

CAPFs
Indian Navy
1 and 2

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, India’s first Hydrogen Internal Combustion Engine (H2ICE) technology solution for heavy-duty trucks has been developed by _________ along with its vehicle partner Ashok Leyland.

quiz.text: 'Swasth Drishti Smriddh Kashi' campaign has been launched by Ministry of Health & Family Welfare to offer free ______ operations to the patients of Varanasi.
options: Ulcerative colitis
tuberculosis
diabetes
cataract
Corneal transplant

quiz.text: Inaugural Meeting of ________ initiative on Critical and Emerging Technologies (iCET) 2023 has recently (Feb 2023) been held to strengthen their defence partnership with an emphasis on co-production and co-development.
options: India-Japan
India-Australia
US-India
India-Israel
India-UAE

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), ISRO has signed an MoU to build training modules for Indian Spaceflight Program, using augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR) & mixed reality (MR) technologies with which of the following institutes?
options: IIT Mumbai

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), India along with which of the following nations has unveiled an ambitious roadmap for cooperation in a plethora of areas including defence, energy and technology under a trilateral framework?

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare (MoA&FW) and ________ have signed an MoU to build a National Interactive Digital Platform.

Food and Agriculture Organization
Digital Green

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL) has partnered with IMT Growth Triangle Joint Business Council to promote the adoption of energy efficiency and sustainable practices in the region. Which of the following countries are part of IMT-GT JBC?
options: Indonesia
Thailand
Maldives
1, 2 and 3
1 and 2

quiz.text: The Government is making efforts for availability of easy financing to renewable energy generating companies. RBI includes bank loans up to a limit of _______ to finance such companies.
options: Rs 30 crore
Rs 10 crore
Rs 5 crore
Rs 20 crore
Rs 50 crore
